snippet: A previously classified memo by John Yoo, then a top Justice Department lawyer, defended the Bush administration’s surveillance program after Sept. 11.
abstract: Obama administration makes public previously classified letter from 2002 revealing Bush administration authorized secret program allowing National Security Agency to eavesdrop on Americas' international communications, which violated wiretapping laws.
